localised_text.tooltip_text: DEV UI - add 1000 research points per turn
DEV UI - add 100 research points per turn
DEV UI - remove 1000 research points per turn
DEV UI - remove 100 research points per turn

dy_cost.componentleveltooltip: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to research this technology.

component_text.text: Seven is the number of the Plague Lord. Seven are the ways which Nurgle infects mortal and immortal alike with contagions. Invoke His methods and become the blessed carrier.
Six is the number of the Dark Prince. Six are the Perfume Houses of Slaanesh, each with captivating scents awaiting to be discovered.
Nine is the number of the Changer. Nine are the levels within the perplexing Ninth Library, Tzeentch’s repository of forgotten knowledge. Scour the bookcases, learn and indulge in our master’s lore.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Format("%d/%d", RoundFloat( MinNumericValue( ChildContext.ResearchedParents, ChildContext.RequiredParentsNumber)), ChildContext.RequiredParentsNumber)

search_tech_count.componentleveltooltip: Number of technologies matching the search word in this tab

callback_with_context.context_function_id: DoIf(self.IsSelected == false && ( (IsContextValid(PlayersFaction.TechnologyManagerContext.CurrentResearchingTechnologyContext) && PlayersFaction.TechnologyManagerContext.CurrentResearchingTechnologyContext.UiTabContext == this) || (IsContextValid(PlayersFaction.TechnologyManagerContext.CurrentResearchingTechnologyContext) == false && PlayersFaction.TechnologyManagerContext.ResearchedTechnologyList.LastContext.UiTabContext == this)) , self.SimulateLClick)

hover.name: hover
hover.tooltip: Any bonuses applied in this section will apply to the following units only. The armament upkeep cost will be applied per unit you own from this section

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: No upgrades are currently unlocked for this unit group. Increase the unit caps of this unit group in order to unlock further upgrades

selected_hover.name: selected_hover
selected_hover.tooltip: Any bonuses applied in this section will apply to the following units only. The armament upkeep cost will be applied per unit you own from this section
